declarations.name: GridElement

attributes.description: set element's display value for each breakpoint
attributes.name: display

attributes.description: set element's padding for each breakpoint (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding

attributes.description: set element's column offset for each breakpoint  (Integers)
attributes.name: offset

attributes.description: set element's flex order for each breakpoint (Integers)
attributes.name: order

attributes.description: set element's font-size for each breakpoint (Font values)
attributes.name: font

attributes.description: set element's column spans for each breakpoint  (Integers)
attributes.name: col

attributes.description: set element's flex gap for each breakpoint (Dimension values)
attributes.name: gap

declarations.summary:
attributes are space-separated values for each break-point
- Dimension values: none, small, medium, large, xlarge, xxlarge, small-, medium-, large-, xlarge-, xxlarge-
- Font values: xsmall, small, medium, large, xlarge, xxlarge
- ex:
- font="medium large xlarge"
- col="12 6 4"

attributes.name: font

attributes.description: set element's padding for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding

attributes.description: set element's margin for each breakpoint, space-separated  (Integers)
attributes.name: margin

attributes.description: set element's margin-top for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: margin-top

attributes.description: set element's margin-right for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: margin-right

attributes.description: set element's margin-bottom for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: margin-bottom

attributes.description: set element's margin-left for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: margin-left

attributes.description: set element's padding-top for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding-top

attributes.description: set element's padding-right for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding-right

attributes.description: set element's padding-bottom for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding-bottom

attributes.description: set element's padding-left for each breakpoint, space-separated (Dimension values)
attributes.name: padding-left

declarations.summary:
attributes are space-separated values for each break-point
- Dimension values: none, small, medium, large, xlarge, xxlarge, small-, medium-, large-, xlarge-, xxlarge-
- Font values: xsmall, small, medium, large, xlarge, xxlarge
- ex:
- font="medium large xlarge"
- col="12 6 4"
